ygData.subject: Re: Root and Shoot
ygData.msgSnippet: Screw em.  I say if you re the first one to root or strike a creature, you re entitled to it.  It would be foolish for a fighter to jump in anyway since a Wiz
ygData.messageBody:
Screw 'em. I say if you're the first one to root or strike a creature,
you're entitled to it. It would be foolish for a fighter to jump in anyway
since a Wiz can almost always outdo a fighter in dmg points anyway.
If you're in a cool group, most people like to use this to the group
advantage so that you can secure kills from other possible KS'ers.

-- Lim'Dul


> Date: Sat, 8 May 1999 10:24:53 -0400
> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>Subject: Re: Root and Shoot
>
>Well.. I find kill stealing is never a problem either on my server, or on
>my
>continent. Not sure which, but I've heard lots of complaints of KS'ing,
>and
>I almost never see someone do it. But that would seriously annoy me, if I
>attacked something and some fighter just jumped in, and then he gave me
>shit. I think I'd freak... oh well...
>
>Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>
